sections.title: Celestial Knight (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Celestial Knight class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Celestial Knight)
sections.description: Celestial knights gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Sentinel Against Undeath ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Celestial Knight)
sections.description: Grants scaling bonuses to Perception, Sense Motive, AC, and CMD when dealing with undead creatures.

sections.title: Teamwork Feat ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Celestial Knight)
sections.description: Grants bonus teamwork feats at regular intervals and allows swapping known teamwork feats for new ones.

sections.title: Aegis Feat ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Celestial Knight)
sections.description: Grants bonus shield-focused combat feats, treating class levels as fighter levels for prerequisites.

sections.title: Favored Enemy ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Celestial Knight)
sections.description: Grants or improves favored enemy bonus against undead creatures, functioning like the ranger ability.

sections.title: Thwart Foul Magic ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Celestial Knight)
sections.description: Disrupts undead spellcasters and increases concentration DCs for necromancy, death, and evil spells.

sections.title: Blessed Conviction (Su) (Celestial Knight)
sections.description: Provides a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against spells and effects created by undead creatures.

sections.title: Purge Malevolence (Su) (Celestial Knight)
sections.description: Allows targeted dispel magic against necromancy, death, or evil descriptor effects as part of a melee attack.

sections.title: Foil Deathcaster ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Celestial Knight)
sections.description: Forces an undead spellcaster to reroll a concentration check as an immediate action once per day.

sections.title: Raiment of Righteousness (Su) (Celestial Knight)
sections.description: Transforms equipment into magical versions with enhanced properties including adamantine armor, glowing shield, resistance cloak, and holy sword effects.
